sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: At that point the radio handset fell to pieces.
sentences.cn: 就在那一刻，无线电遥控器摔得粉碎。

sentences.en: DAB is the radio system of the 21st Century.
sentences.cn: 数字音频广播是21世纪的无线电广播系统。

sentences.en: He introduced radio to the school to increase the children's awareness.
sentences.cn: 他在学校开通广播，以提高孩子们的警觉性。

sentences.en: He put the radio on loud to stop himself thinking about it.
sentences.cn: 他把收音机的音量开得很大，好让自己不再想这件事。

sentences.en: I don’t really listen to the radio very much.
sentences.cn: 我不怎么听广播。

sentences.en: I sat down and turned on the radio.
sentences.cn: 我坐下来打开收音机。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: She took part in a BBC radio phone-in programme.
sentences.cn: 她参加了英国广播公司听众来电参与节目。

sentences.en: The BBC has just successfully demonstrated a new digital radio transmission system.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司刚刚成功地演示了一套新的数字无线电传输系统。

sentences.en: The last 12 months have been difficult ones for local radio.
sentences.cn: 最近的12个月对地方广播电台来说是艰难的。

sentences.en: The officer radioed for advice.
sentences.cn: 那名军官发电请求指示。

sentences.en: The radio had fed him a diet of pop songs.
sentences.cn: 他从广播里听到的都是千篇一律的流行歌曲。

sentences.en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentences.cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentences.en: The radio station claimed that 87,000 "reactionaries" had been eliminated.
sentences.cn: 广播电台声称已经消灭了87,000名“反动分子”。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: They are in twice daily radio contact with the rebel leader.
sentences.cn: 他们每天用无线电和叛军首领联系两次。

sentences.en: Troops are still in control of the television and radio tower.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然控制着电视和广播发射塔。

sentences.en: TV is using radio as a seedbed for ideas.
sentences.cn: 电视正从广播节目中汲取灵感。

sentences.en: We’ve lost radio contact with the plane.
sentences.cn: 我们和这架飞机失去了无线电联络。
